short_summary: The Department of National Defense requires assorted parts for vehicles and equipment.
description: The Department of National Defense has a requirement for assorted parts for vehicles and equipment to be delivered to the Canadian Forces' Edmonton and Montreal departments.
tags: Vehicle and Equipment Maintenance and Repair
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: Request for Proposal (RFP)

## Tender Details

### Solicitation Number: W8486-249405/A

* Reference Number: cb-587-94858750
* Amendment Number: 6
* Publication Date: 2024-05-01
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-06-28T14:00:00
* Amendment Date: 2024-06-28
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-07-19
* Expected Contract End Date: 2024-10-18

### Tender Status

* Tender Status: Expired

## Tender Description

The Department of National Defence invites proposals for the supply of assorted spares, including valves, fuel components, drivetrain systems, and electrical equipment. The tender includes 32 specific items with varying quantities and requirements.

* Item 1: Valve Solenoid (Part No. M31E1-24V, NCAGE: 24522)
* Item 2: Valve Solenoid (Part No. 9024028, NCAGE: 0CHW9)
* ... (Continued to Item 32)

Bidders must provide equivalent or substitute products that meet the required specifications. The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

## Documents

All tender documents, including amendments, can be accessed via the following websites:

* English: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/37319/w8486-249405---hlvw---spares---assorted---rfp---amendment-003_eng.pdf>
* French: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/37319/w8486-249405---vllr---pieces-de-rechange---variete---dp_fra_0.pdf>

## Tender Evaluation and Award

The tender evaluation will be based on the lowest price.

## Submission Instructions

Electronic submissions are required. All proposals must be submitted by email only to <DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca>.

## Contact Information

For any questions or concerns, please contact:
Yewon Pyeon
yewon.pyeon@forces.gc.ca
(000) 000-0000
